1.0.name: wordpress/buddypress-mandatory-groups
1.0.description:
Site administrators can enforce group membership policy with BuddyPress by using the BuddyPress Mandatory Groups plugin.

Users locked in to a group or group are unable to leave that group. Functions are available for system integrators to add membership enforcement to other processes.
